articles.description: BYU punctuated what’s already been an unforgettable 2020 season with a dominant 49-23 victory over UCF in the Boca Raton Bowl.
articles.content: BYU punctuated whats already been an unforgettable 2020 season with what may have been its best performance of the year, as the Cougars cruised past UCF 49-23 in the Boca Raton Bowl on Tuesday night.… [+16271 chars]
